1007590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Libram of Lost Spells, Volume I (5E)
1007590.description:
Libram of Lost Spells, Volume I

The Libram of Lost Spellstakes you on a trip through time to reach back to older editions of the 'World's Most Popular Roleplaying Game' and enjoy some of the greatest spells of those days, forgotten to the current game.
We've recreated these spells with great care, bringing them to life again for the 5th edition of the game. Each volume presents 20 "new" spells that you may recognize with great fondness.
Enjoy the nostolgia of these great spells once more or just interject some surprises of new spells into your games today!
VOLUME I:
  • Accelerated Healing2nd (Cleric, Druid)
  • Armor Of Faith1st (Cleric)
  • Baleful GlareCantrip (Bard, Warlock, Wizard)
  • Bone Spurs2nd (Wizard)
  • Circle of Serpents2nd (Cleric, Druid, Ranger)
  • Clutch the Heart6th (Cleric, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard)
  • Death Fog5th (Wizard)
  • Eye of the Storm5th (Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer)
  • Foretold Doom3rd (Bard, Cleric, Druid, Warlock, Wizard)
  • Glassteel8th (Sorcerer, Wizard)
  • Guiding Arrow1st (Ranger)
  • Healing Dyad4th (Cleric, Paladin)
  • Ice Caltrops1st (Druid, Ranger, Sorcerer)
  • Kiss of the Vargouille5th (Warlock, Wizard)
  • Lockjaw2nd (Druid, Ranger)
  • Memento
    Mori2nd (Bard, Cleric, Warlock)
  • Paralytic Spittle1st (Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock)
  • Protection from Normal Missiles3rd (Cleric, Sorcerer, Wizard)
  • Quick Armor1st (Cleric, Paladin)
  • RazorleafCantrip (Druid)
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
